description: For moments of delight, blessings, and spiritual elevation — helping the user connect joy to remembrance and humility.

primary.text_en: Say, 'In the bounty of Allah and in His mercy — in that let them rejoice; it is better than what they accumulate.'
primary.text_ar: قُلْ بِفَضْلِ ٱللَّهِ وَبِرَحْمَتِهِۦ فَبِذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَفْرَحُوا۟ ۖ هُوَ خَيْرٞ مِّمَّا يَجْمَعُونَ
primary.explanation: True joy is found in Allah's mercy.

primary.text_en: Whoever does righteousness, whether male or female, while he is a believer — We will surely cause him to live a good life.
primary.text_ar: مَنْ عَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا مِّن ذَكَرٍ أَوْ أُنثَىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤْمِنٞ فَلَنُحْيِيَنَّهُۥ حَيَوٰةٗ طَيِّبَةٗ
primary.explanation: Righteous living brings inner peace and happiness.

primary.text_en: Those will be awarded the Chamber for what they patiently endured, and they will be received therein with greetings and [words of] peace.
primary.text_ar: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يُجْزَوْنَ ٱلْغُرْفَةَ بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ وَيُلَقَّوْنَ فِيهَا تَحِيَّةٗ وَسَلَـٰمٗا

primary.text_en: Indeed, Allah is beautiful and loves beauty.
primary.explanation: Joy can be found in beauty and appreciating Allah’s blessings.

primary.text_en: The most beloved actions to Allah are those done consistently, even if small.
primary.explanation: Joy grows through consistent good actions.

primary.text_en: A believer is amazed at his condition. Everything is good for him — if he is given good, he is thankful and that is good for him.

duas.text_en: O Allah, as You have made my appearance beautiful, so make my character beautiful too.
duas.text_ar: اللَّهُمَّ كَمَا حَسَّنْتَ خَلْقِي فَحَسِّنْ خُلُقِي
duas.explanation: A joyful moment to nurture inner beauty.

duas.text_en: All praise is due to Allah Who has relieved me from suffering and granted me well-being.
duas.text_ar: ٱلْـحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي عَافَانِي مِمَّا ٱبْتَلَىٰ بِهِ غَيْرِي
duas.explanation: Joy includes recognizing protection from harm.

reflection: Joy is not separate from faith — it’s a fruit of it. The believer finds joy in worship, in blessings, and even in trials knowing Allah is near. Celebrate with humility, smile with gratitude, and let your joy be a bridge to increase remembrance.
